## [Instalación de R]{style="color:#003300;"}
<hr style="height:2px;border-width:0;color:#330019;background-color:#330019">

 1. Ir a la página oficial de [R](https://www.r-project.org)
   
 2. click en [download R]() para el Sistema Operativo (winOS, macOS, Linux)
   
3. Seleccionar el CRAN Mirrors
   
4. Guardar Archivo
   
5. Ir a la carpeta de descargas
   
6. Instalar R

## [Instalación de RStudio]{style="color:#003300;"}
<hr style="height:2px;border-width:0;color:#330019;background-color:#330019">

1. Ir a la página oficial de [RStudio](https://posit.co)
   
2. click en [download RStudio]()
   
3. download RStudio desktop for OS

4. Guardar Archivo
   
5. Ir a la carpeta de descargas
   
6. Instalar RStudio
   

## [Instalación de paquetes desde CRAN]{style="color:#003300;"}
<hr style="height:2px;border-width:0;color:#330019;background-color:#330019">

::: {.panel-tabset}

### Un paquete

```{r, echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, error=FALSE}
# Instalamos el paquete
install.packages("ggplot2", 
                 repos = "http://cran.us.r-project.org")

# Verificamos la instalación
library(ggplot2)
```

### Varios paquetes
```{r}
#| echo: true
#| output: true
# Instalamos el paquete

install.packages(c("sf", "tmap", "ggspatial"), 
                 repos = "http://cran.us.r-project.org")

# Verificamos la instalación
library(sf)
```


:::

## [Instalación de paquete desde GitHub]{style="color:#003300;"}
<hr style="height:2px;border-width:0;color:#330019;background-color:#330019">

::: {.panel-tabset}

### devtools

```{r, echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, error=FALSE}
# Instalamos el paquete
#| echo: true
#| output: true
# devtools::install_github("fdzul/dendata")

```

### remotes
```{r, echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, error=FALSE}
#| echo: true
#| output: true
# Instalamos el paquete
# remotes::install_github("fdzul/rhealthdiag")
# Verificamos la instalacion
library(rhealthdiag)
```

### pak
```{r}
#| echo: true
#| output: true

# Instalamos el paquete
pak::pkg_install("hughjonesd/ggmagnify")
# Verificamos la instalacion
library(ggmagnify)
```

:::

## [Universo de Vectores en R]{style="color:#003300;"}
<hr style="height:2px;border-width:0;color:#330019;background-color:#330019">

```{r universo_vbd, echo=FALSE, out.width='100%', fig.align='center'}

DiagrammeR::grViz("digraph {
                  # graph definitions
  graph [layout = dot, rankdir = TB]
  
  # node definitions
  node [shape = rectangle, 
  style = filled, 
  color = grey, 
  nodesep = .5,
  fixedsize = true, 
  width = 2] 
  
  # edge definition
  edge [color = grey, arrowhead = normal, arrowtail = dot]
  
  ##### Spatial Data
  
  
  vectores [label = 'Vectores', fillcolor =  ' #0F9D58', color = 'white', fontcolor = 'white']
  
 # 
 etverse [label = 'ETVerse*',  fillcolor =  '#F4B400', color = 'white', fontcolor = 'black']
 ivaverse [label = 'IVAverse',  fillcolor =  '#F4B400', color = 'white', fontcolor = 'black']
 
 transverse [label = 'transverse',  fillcolor =  '#F4B400', color = 'white', fontcolor = 'black']
 
 # ETVerse
 
 dengueverse  [label = 'dengueverse*',  fillcolor =  '#4285F4', color = 'white', fontcolor = 'white']
 leisverse  [label = 'leisverse',  fillcolor =  '#4285F4', color = 'white', fontcolor = 'white']
 chagasverse  [label = 'chagasverse',  fillcolor =  '#4285F4', color = 'white', fontcolor = 'white']
 malverse  [label = 'malverse',  fillcolor =  '#4285F4', color = 'white', fontcolor = 'white']
 
 # IVAverse
 
 alaverse  [label = 'alaverse',  fillcolor =  '#4285F4', color = 'white', fontcolor = 'white']
 araverse  [label = 'araverse',  fillcolor =  '#4285F4', color = 'white', fontcolor = 'white']
 
 #
 
 denhotspots [label = 'denhotspots*',  fillcolor =  ' #0F9D58', color = 'white', fontcolor = 'white']
 deneggs [label = 'deneggs*',  fillcolor =  ' #0F9D58', color = 'white', fontcolor = 'white']
 denepikit [label = 'densnv*',  fillcolor =  ' #0F9D58', color = 'white', fontcolor = 'white']
 dencontrol [label = 'dencontrol',  fillcolor =  ' #0F9D58', color = 'white', fontcolor = 'white']
 
 # 
 
 # transverse
 rgeomex [label = 'rgeomex*',  fillcolor =  '#DB4437', color = 'white', fontcolor = 'white']
 climatemx [label = 'climex',  fillcolor =  '#DB4437', color = 'white', fontcolor = 'white']
 popmx [label = 'popmex',  fillcolor =  '#DB4437', color = 'white', fontcolor = 'white']
 
 ##### define the relation
 
 #
 vectores -> {etverse ivaverse  transverse} 
 etverse -> {dengueverse chagasverse leisverse malverse}
 ivaverse -> {alaverse araverse}
 dengueverse -> {denhotspots deneggs denepikit dencontrol}
 transverse -> {rgeomex climatemx popmx}  
  
}")

```
